[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","h2",null,{"id":"reacttestrenderercreate-warning","children":"ReactTestRenderer.create() warning "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"react-test-renderer is deprecated. A warning will fire whenever calling ReactTestRenderer.create() or ReactShallowRender.render(). The react-test-renderer package will remain available on NPM but will not be maintained and may break with new React features or changes to React’s internals."}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["The React Team recommends migrating your tests to ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://testing-library.com/docs/react-testing-library/intro/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"@testing-library/react"}]," or ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://callstack.github.io/react-native-testing-library/docs/getting-started","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"@testing-library/react-native"}]," for a modern and well supported testing experience."]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"new-shallowrenderer-warning","children":"new ShallowRenderer() warning "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["The react-test-renderer package no longer exports a shallow renderer at ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"react-test-renderer/shallow"}],". This was simply a repackaging of a previously extracted separate package: ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"react-shallow-renderer"}],". Therefore you can continue using the shallow renderer in the same way by installing it directly. See ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/enzymejs/react-shallow-renderer","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Github"}]," / ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-shallow-renderer","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"NPM"}],"."]}]]}]]
